titles.title: Pre-Existing Conditions Protection Act of 2020
Pre-Existing Conditions Protection Act of 2020
A bill to ensure coverage of pre-existing conditions under private health insurance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Pre-Existing Conditions Protection Act of 2020
This bill specifies that private health insurers may not impose coverage exclusions, limitations, or charges based on preexisting conditions or health status. (Current law also prohibits such actions.)
